chapter.title: City3D Developer Guide
chapter.para: The City3D project implements a 3 dimensional visualization of a Traffic map file and adds some additional functionaliy.

This document is structured as follows:
Overview
BON-Diagram to get an overview.
Shared constants
Description of class SHARED_CONSTANTS.
Widgets
Description of the classes that are responsible for the user interface.
Buildings
How are the buildings created?
Factories
Explanation of the buildings factory and the line factory.
Utilities
Utilities for drawing 3D objects.
Notes
Notes from the developers of City3D.
